translation: The Chan and Lamp Chronicle, Volume 4

source_sentence: 南嶽下臨濟宗黃龍法派世系圖
translation: Lineage Chart of the Huanglong School of Buddhism of the Linji School of Nanyue

source_sentence: (十二世)黃龍慧南(卍進本十二世為八世。
translation: (12th) Huanglong Huinan (The twelfth generation of the Manjñāna school was the eighth.

source_sentence: 已下遞次準之)信州章氏子。
translation: (The following are in order of precedence.) He was the son of Zhang of Xinzhou.

source_sentence: 宋仁宗熙寧二年己酉三月十七日示寂。
translation: He passed away on the 17th day of the 3rd month of the 2nd year of the reign of the Song Dynasty Emperor Renning.
He was crowned with the title Puguo.

source_sentence: 哲宗元符三年庚辰十一月十七日示寂。
translation: He passed away on the 17th day of the 11th month of the 3rd year of Genfu's reign of the Zhezong school.
He was honored with the title of Jeweled Enlightenment.

source_sentence: 徽宗政和七年己酉九月十八日示寂。
translation: He passed away on the 18th day of the 9th month in the 7th year of the reign of Emperor Huizong Zhenghe.
meditation on the originally silenced text
wisdom that abides at the site of the (Buddha-)Path
the Wheel of the Dharma should end
to broadly transform into something beautiful
great mind-mass of the humane king
to preserve the merit of one's original position
to show the glories of the (Buddha-)Path
to die and awaken to new things

source_sentence: 徽宗政和五年丙申十二月十五日示寂。
translation: He passed away on the fifteenth day of the twelfth month of the fifth year of the reign of King Huizong Zhenghe.
marvelous universality of emptiness in nature
Bamboo Garden Pearl of the Way
wisdom power of the adept in the knowledge of the empty room
to make the Dharma ocean appear
to show intimacy as a mirror
repaying kindness to the constant Dharma
knowledge of the abodes of the most excellent conditions
wisdom illumination of the bent foot
the clarity of the true Dharma
a man of the Liang Shan family
selected by the light of Vulture Peak
to tilt the country in the direction of prosperity
reverence for excellence and good behavior

source_sentence: 萬壽普信(卍進本揭出萬壽等五人于廣教下)能仁琢鶴林妙孝感竦永寧道全慧日興道法慧沖崇寧超廣教嚚二靈知和東禪從密龍牙宗密興化可都道吾楚芳資福郁景德良玉薦福真開福德筠雲居如山石霜楚蟾雪峯有需雪峯慧忠上藍獨秀宏淨眾全天寧靖皷山宗譯陳體常居士木平覺澄資福省悟南山崗照天童普交蓬萊圓圓通道旻圓通守慧黃龍道觀左丞范沖樞密吳居厚諫議彭汝霖中丞盧航左司都貺雙林道基衡嶽道辨無相繼才禾山志傳鹿苑景深興福康源壽寧成則褒親宗諭資福懷寶龍泉夔興化以弼兜率志恩萬壽智圓景福惟潔隆慶志深承天德綏羅漢省賢祥符智先普門子淵棲真德嵩東禪惟資慧力可昌慧力洞源福勝常極雲溪文慶慧燈擇英勝光清宥仁王智誠安國慶常上藍希肇大寧文廣圓通可僊明招文慧宣秘禮淨光和尚淨光了威浮山法真靈巖徽祥符立報恩淳慈姥巖諒長松山錦東禪道極開先行瑛慈氏瑞先大溈海評道林法照光孝文璟游地汝英三植灌沖寶葢用興天寧宗順靈山慧浩淨土希黃檗道欽九仙次岸正法無照盧山智通龍牙宗密德山聲絕崇福德徽靈泉仁美分寧洞微上座慧圓勝業有通報恩明昌東林思度妙果法喜岳林圓明廣教德方護國康慈母子詠開元志添興化愈先乾明載昌福嚴惟鳳護法安祐北巖法融龍紀以定慕山覺能衡山善孜褒親有瑞壽寧道完興國昌法雨元謚象田梵卿石佛益靈寶持光孝淨源九巖仲文象田珍光孝宗益華嚴和尚洞山永邦廬巖崇斗方慶大寧道才太平普清城清傳萬杉紹慈白馬元德章山楚當雙峯省琮清化從璉內翰蘇軾亷泉曇秀禾山德普黃龍自慶水南智秘南華清桂法輪文昱慧日富三角慧澤湧泉以金粟慧英慧日普覺西峯正信翠巖寶贇歸宗進寶峯克文陝府閿鄉鄭氏子。
translation: 萬壽普信(卍進本揭出萬壽等五人于廣教下)能仁琢鶴林妙孝感竦永寧道全慧日興道法慧沖崇寧超廣教嚚二靈知和東禪從密龍牙宗密興化可都道吾楚芳資福郁景德良玉薦福真開福德筠雲居如山石霜楚蟾雪峯有需雪峯慧忠上藍獨秀宏淨眾全天寧靖皷山宗譯陳體常居士木平覺澄資福省悟南山崗照天童普交蓬萊圓圓通道旻圓通守慧黃龍道觀左丞范沖樞密吳居厚諫議彭汝霖中丞盧航左司都貺雙林道基衡嶽道辨無相繼才禾山志傳鹿苑景深興福康源壽寧成則褒親宗諭資福懷寶龍泉夔興化以弼兜率志恩萬壽智圓景福惟潔隆慶志深承天德綏羅漢省賢祥符智先普門子淵棲真德嵩東禪惟資慧力可昌慧力洞源福勝常極雲溪文慶慧燈擇英勝光清宥仁王智誠安國慶常上藍希肇大寧文廣圓通可僊明招文慧宣秘禮淨光和尚淨光了威浮山法真靈巖徽祥符立報恩淳慈姥巖諒長松山錦東禪道極開先行瑛慈氏瑞先大溈海評道林法照光孝文璟游地汝英三植灌沖寶葢用興天寧宗順靈山慧浩淨土希黃檗道欽九仙次岸正法無照盧山智通龍牙宗密德山聲絕崇福德徽靈泉仁美分寧洞微上座慧圓勝業有通報恩明昌東林思度妙果法喜岳林圓明廣教德方護國康慈母子詠開元志添興化愈先乾明載昌福嚴惟鳳護法安祐北巖法融龍紀以定慕山覺能衡山善孜褒親有瑞壽寧道完興國昌法雨元謚象田梵卿石佛益靈寶持光孝淨源九巖仲文象田珍光孝宗益華嚴和尚洞山永邦廬巖崇斗方慶大寧道才太平普清城清傳萬杉紹慈白馬元德章山楚當雙峯省琮清化從璉內翰蘇軾亷泉曇秀禾山德普黃龍自慶水南智秘南華清桂法輪文昱慧日富三角慧澤湧泉以金粟慧英慧日普覺西峯正信翠巖寶贇歸宗進寶峯克文陝府閿鄉鄭氏子。
He was given the name Zhenjing.

source_sentence: 宋崇寧元年十月十六日中夜示寂。
translation: He passed away in the middle of the night on the 16th day of the 10th month of the first year of the Song Dynasty.
A white light rose from Jāvi.
All that was reached by the smoke became relics.
to throw oneself into the path of the child and become victorious
transcend the stillness of the teachings
head seat of the Shuangxi Seal
nine sages of the Dharma Ching
the cause of enlightenment and the Dharma
function of the Jia You Dao
Gengyou, who lives in the clouds
to observe and follow the ocean
the power of wisdom and the noble teaching
attribution of merit to a particular school
Marvelous Fruit of the Perfection of Merit
inheriting the treasures of heaven and earth
shore of the heavenly king's abode
to bestow the teachings and hope for the best
faith in the enlightenment of the rules and methods
valleys are hidden and quietly visible
insight of the sun of wisdom
great great ancestor of fruits and sweetmeats
master of transformation and exalted truth
emptiness of the Dharma of the Divine Truth
there is constancy in higher rebirths
the wheel of the Dharma is fully extended
the Way, the scene, and the Dharma
opening the auspicious text and jewels
the conglomeration of the teachings of the Dharma

source_sentence: 宋元祐六年十一月十六日陞座說偈而化。
translation: He was promoted to the throne on the 16th day of the 11th month in the 6th year of the Song Dynasty, spoke a verse, and passed away.
He was given the title Zhengwu.
His stūpa was named Ding Ying.
bathing in the light of southern meditation
to practice on the fixed mountains
the river and the springs are peaceful

source_sentence: 宋元豐四年三月七日寂闍維。
translation: On the seventh day of the third month in the fourth year of the Song Dynasty, he died in Jāvi.
The area reached by the smoke was forty miles.
They all receive relics as golden as gold.
to take part in the government of Sukhāvatī
Dharma School of the Third Patriarch
Dharma performance of the Fourth Patriarch
clear and level Chos kyi 'byung gum

source_sentence: (十六世)育王介諶(卍進本十六世為十二世。
translation: (16th) Yuwang Jiejie Nie (the 16th lineage of the Swamiji school was the 12th lineage.

source_sentence: 已下遞次準之)(十七世)萬年曇賁號心聞。
translation: (The following are in order.) (17th) Wannian Tanben was called Xinwen.
to cast off the seeds of the Pure Land
monk of the Order of Peace
The two preceding heirs grew Lingzhuo.
The Chan and Lamp Chronicle, Volume 4
